Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball led the Charlotte Hornets to a 115-104 upset win against the Phoenix Suns.
LaMelo Ball finished the game with 32 points, 10 rebounds, seven assists and four steals.
LaMelo Ball made a play early in the first quarter that created a social media buzz by faking a shot and passing to Brandon Miller.
Mark Williams scored despite getting hammered by Mason Plumlee after receiving a pass from Brandon Miller.
